void onCreate ()
 Create the database scheme.

Detailed Description

the state database

This class contains management of state databases. It creates new databases and opens or upgrades existing ones.

Definition at line 33 of file qmdatabase.h.

Member Function Documentation

void votca::ctp::QMDatabase::onCreate (  )  [virtual]

Create the database scheme.

This function is called when a database is created. All tables and triggers should be added here.

Reimplemented from votca::tools::Database.
